item.description:
Inbound Marketing University is where you to go to learn why content is king and the business blog is still king of social media.

You also learn from real-world case studies how to do inbound, aka content, marketing from professionals who have 'been there done that' again and again and ....

Weekly training is offered up WEBINAR style until we reach critical mass. At which time, professional blogger Bill Belew, MBA marketing professor, published author and international in-demand speaker will come to Boston to conduct training face-to-face.

See you online.

----

While I have you -

Ask your self these questions -

How much would you pay for

1. A website evaluation from an SEO, traffic and business blogging expert?

Read what people pay me for website evaluations. (The earlier you get in the higher the likelihood of getting an evaluation!)

2. Forum access to other serious minded business bloggers, real back links from real people in your niche and access to other blogger who can/will guest blog for you and let you do the same for them? (Read more about the business blogger forum…)

3.  A place to get those real backlinks from real people from real quality sites. (Read how much does it cost to get a real backlink from a high quality site.)

4. Access to real people who want to guest blog for you and have you do the same for them. (Read 7 ways to find somebody to guest blog at your site or get asked to guest blog at theirs)

5.  Access to a real business blogging job board of current available paying blogging opportunities  – (how much is a job worth to you?) (Read more about business blogging job boards …)

6. Training on how to get a press pass to almost any industry event AND a recommendation from a current press pass holder? (Learn which industry events I have been given press passes to.)

7. MBA level training in business blogging at Meetups in SV $20/event (Read about business blog training.)

8. The opportunity to change real kids’ lives thru Bill’s kids contributions – (priceless) (Read more about an orphanage that Bill met firsthand is changing …)

9. Person to person Q & A with an SEO expert.

10. The opportunity to present your niche topic before nearly 5000 like--minded members? (Read more …)

All these benefits are available through this Meetup.

The owner of this Meetup group, Bill Belew, is a professional blogger = he pays his sizable Silicon Valley mortgage through revenue from traffic alone to his network of sites. Bill Belew is a university professor and in-demand speaker fromDigital Media Asia Malaysia to Mexico to NYC to Blogworld / New Media Live in Vegas to his home-town, Sunnyvale, in the heart of Silicon Valley.

Bill Belew is also the author the best-read series How to Blog for Money and Trafficonline, four published books and two more in the pipeline with Kendall Hunt Publishing. Join this Meetup to participate in live and webinar-style Meetups with Bill Belew.

And by all means consider accessing all the above benefits today for just $20/monthly by subscribing to the Bill Belew membership site.

Go ahead, you know you want to.
item.name: Inbound Marketing University - Boston
